name: Amaymon
ability: Skill attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting stun.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon that controls the land and earth. She's really open-minded about most things, which has won her the affection of many other spirits. She's also known for being a passionate fan of a certain elven pop group. Although she never gets angry under normal circumstances--almost like some sort of enlightened Buddha--when it comes to her favorite group of elves, she gets worked up over even the tiniest of details. This has made her a legend among hardcore fans.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 16/11/16 - 07/12/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 12/04/16 - 07/12/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the drop rate of Seed of Thanks by 25% during the "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 16/11/16 - 07/12/16

main: "Not bad, not bad at all. You'll do just fine!"
skill: "I'll show you what it means to control the land."
limit_break: "I've gotta go show my idols some love!"
